e5: An ethical reporting policy in this context should prioritize transparency.  It must acknowledge the historic bias,  while striving for consistency in reporting moving forward. Investors are aware that adjustments will be needed but should receive clear communication. We should avoid any deceptive practices that might create false expectations.
e6: In addition to the financial data and legal considerations mentioned, it would be wise to ask the management team about investor sentiment surveys or market research to gauge their reactions. This will help us understand if any potential drawbacks or benefits might arise before implementing the new policy.
q9: The first interstellar object to be discovered and detected passing through our Solar System was 1I/ʻOumuamua (now designated Ouyasa-2).
